pageTitle: Jonathan Simkhai Metallic Tweed Bustier Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 6.5in / 16.5cm, from center back MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. Lining: 95% polyester/5% spandex. Shell: 100% polyester. Fabric: Coated tweed. A futuristic take on the bustier top, rendered in an eye-catching mix of metallic and matte tweed. Padded cups and boning provide structure. Hook-and-eye closures and adjustable spaghetti straps. Lined. Description Jonathan Simkhai > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer After honing his skills as a buyer in New York, Jonathan Simkhai studied at Parsons and FIT, and soon after launched his eponymous brand in 2010. Designing for the laid-back girl with a rebellious streak, Simkhai puts his signature androgynous twist on basic wardrobe essentials, taking inspiration from beautiful materials and traditional menswear. Each collection blurs gender lines for a forward approach, translating classic tailored looks into sexy, feminine silhouettes. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all Shopbop products.
